infos.value: What should we do, Lord Mont?
Do we fight? Or should we retreat for the time being?
Oh, my apologies. I was looking for them.
Now that you mention it, I haven't seen hide nor hair of them.
I don't see Sadali's warrior monks anywhere, either.
In other words...neither of them are here?
We could fall back and wait until «Rubeus» arrives to aid us...
But doing so may give Muraga the time he needs to return.
At the very least, Muraga's absence means his main force is absent as well.
Based on our previous battles, I would wager that we have a real chance at victory.
We are your sword, Lord Mont. You need only give us the order.
We can't let this opportunity pass us by.
